article_title: It’s unanimous: Omaha is now Bud Crawford’s town
article_text:

og.description: Not long ago, before he became the WBO lightweight champion in March, Terence “Bud” Crawford could walk through parts of his hometown and go completely unrecognized.
og.title: It’s unanimous: Omaha is now Bud Crawford’s town
